title: Scott Johnson Farm Services business redirection auction | March 18 2015 | Purple Wave

tasks.task: Participate in an auction for farm equipment.
subtasks: Identify Scott Johnson Farm Services auction.
Review available equipment for bidding (five 2011 Kloss 960 forage harvesters, three 2013 Macdon M205 wind rovers, six row crop heads, five pickup heads, silage tube bagger, tractors, trailers).
Bid on desired equipment before the auction ends on Wednesday, March 18th at 10 a.m.
Understand that each asset sells to the highest bidder regardless of price.
Note the ease of bidding and process.
